name: Need Not You
description:
Controls:
x = A
z = B
arrow-keys = D-pad
(this game does support controller)
A dark, atmospheric RPG that has something to say but doesn't know how to say it. There is a hatred that needs to be spoken but some things are just meant to mean not nothing. Your love means nothing and there are no secrets.

ASSETS:
https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles-supplemental
